name: Terrorist Commando Assault
description:
Terrorist Commando Assault is the realistic 3d action army game. In frontline commando shooting you are the real army ssg commando be the brave combat fighter and scope out the enemies by taking aim and shoot kill them until your ammo is out, then reload your weapon

FEATURES:
Outstanding combat missions and sniper operations
Multiple crime hunting techniques and strategies
Realistic soldiers and thrilling fighting
Compatible interface and control adjustment
